title: About the new Enchanted Galio Splash
body:
Nothing really to criticize (love the splash and the skin) just got a little idea/tweak for it.

The trees in this splash are all pines/firs. imo his new skin looks more like an occult maia/inca/aztec sculpture. rlly dont complain about that. but, imho, his background should look more like jungle. 

U could maybe add/implement a forgotten ruin or a waterfall in the mountain aswell.

Just thoughts i wanted to share. 

https://articles.pvplive.net/article_images/wp-galio-enchanted-logo.jpg

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-obek27-pNPM/UjsfVWYa7jI/AAAAAAAAAD4/03qajU0vZy4/s1600/IMG_4578.JPG

replies.body: Good idea! Maybe. But maybe not. I just said what would fit more the skin.
The pines are because the are high up on the mountains. If the trees you suggested were in that area they would all be dead.
For me it looks more like a valley. So no hypothetically dead trees. ;)
You can see the point where the trees meet the snow.
thats cause Galio is gigantic in this pic. and i think for their artist it wouldnt be hard to even change that too.

[Mike Azevedo](https://www.artstation.com/artist/mikeazevedo)

artist for the new Enchanted Galio splash
ehem, ok.... ty? do u want me to write him a personal mail or why did u post his name?
it's a link to his artstation bro

kk, so Enchanted Galio is more something like this:

http://de.easy-lol.com/images/articleImages/midseason2016jungle/Blue_Sentinel.jpg

but imo due to his chiseled, mossy stone appearance  and his stiff movement, he could also be something more like this:

http://static.hentai.mangadrawing.net/users/imagecache/display/admin/image/bow-weapon-elf-glowing-eyes-golem-leaf.7854f4f94a6b2b6da5d07c5a5716819d-15996.jpg

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/riseoflegends/images/4/44/Cuotl_City.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110821204901

but well if u dont agree, i do understand it. that was just an idea i wanted to share.
